data.name: UserInactive
data.value: The user ({0}) is inactive. Please contact the system administrator for further assistance.

data.name: UserLockout
data.value: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again after {0}

data.name: InvalidPassword
data.value: The username or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

data.name: DeviceNotFound
data.value: The specified Device ({0}) does not exist. Contact support if the issue persists.

data.name: DeviceNotActive
data.value: The device ({0}) is inactive. Please contact the system administrator for further assistance.

data.name: DeviceMismatch
data.value: Device mismatch detected. Access denied for device ({0}).

data.name: LocationNotAvailable
data.value: Location ID ({0}) is not available. Please verify the configuration.

data.name: LocationNotActive
data.value: The location ({0}) is not active. Please contact the system administrator for assistance.

data.name: CompanyNotActiveCompanyIdNull
data.value: Company ID is missing in the configuration. Please update the config file and try again.

data.name: CompanyNotFound
data.value: The specified company ({0}) was not found. Please verify the Company ID and try again.

data.name: CompanyNotActive
data.value: Company ({0}) is currently inactive. Access is not allowed.

data.name: PermissionDenied
data.value: You are not authorized to use this feature. Please contact your system administrator if you believe this is an error.
